devdoc.details: One instance per Chainlink price feed should be deployed. Multiple products may use the same      ChainlinkOracle instance if their payoff functions are based on the same underlying oracle.      This implementation only support non-negative prices.

params.version: The version of which to lookup

returns._0: The current oracle version after sync

_decimalOffset.details: Decimal offset used to normalize chainlink price to 18 decimals

_startingVersionForPhaseId.details: Mapping of the first oracle version for each underlying phase ID

base.details: Base token address for the Chainlink oracle

quote.details: Quote token address for the Chainlink oracle

devdoc.title: ChainlinkOracle

sync().notice: Checks for a new price and updates the internal phase annotation state accordingly

userdoc.notice: Chainlink implementation of the IOracle interface.
